monogr.title: Residences, Castles, Settlements: Transformation Processes from Late Antiquity to Early Islam in Bilad al-Sham. Proceedings of the International Conference Held at Damascus, 5-9 November 2006

body.bibl: Konrad, Michaela. “Roman Military Fortifications along the Eastern Desert Frontier: Settlement Continuities and Change in North Syria, 4th–8th Centuries A.D.” In Residences, Castles, Settlements: Transformation Processes from Late Antiquity to Early Islam in Bilad al-Sham. Proceedings of the International Conference Held at Damascus, 5-9 November 2006, edited by Karin Bartl and Abd al-Razzaq Moaz, 433–54. Orient-Archäologie 24. Rahden, Westfalen: Verlag Marie Leidorf, 2008.
